Docs.param: Reference to the Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Scheduler.IJobCollectionOperations.
Required. The name of the cloud service.
Required. A name for the JobCollection. The name must be unique as scoped within the CloudService. The name can be up to 100 characters in length.
Docs.summary: Determine if the JobCollection name is available to be used. JobCollection names must be unique within a cloud-service.
Docs.returns: The Check Name Availability operation response.
